Name: Issue 360
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #360 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of this weeks Xamarin and DotNet MAUI community news and articles.

Articles.Title: UI & UX Micro-Tips: Best of 2022
Articles.Description: A compilation of useful User Experience tips, and tricks for any app.
Articles.Author: Marc Andrew

Articles.Title: Bad App Design – What Mistakes Should You Avoid in a New App Design?
Articles.Description: Would you like to learn what UX and UI design experts call a "bad app design"?
Articles.Author: UXPin

Articles.Title: Improving MAUI & Xamarin Code Quality with Pre Git Commit Linting
Articles.Description: This tutorial shows how easy it is to use tools common to other frameworks, to enforce coding standards across all developers on a MAUI/Xamarin mobile app project.
Articles.Author: Saamer Mansoor

Articles.Title: Lazy Load JSON Data in Xamarin.Forms ListView: An Overview
Articles.Description: This blog teaches you how to show a fixed amount of JSON data on initial loading (lazy load) and show a busy indicator while loading the remaining data on scrolling in the Xamarin.Forms ListView.

Articles.Title: Playing audio in .NET MAUI applications
Articles.Description: This post covers how we can add the ability to play audio files in our .NET MAUI applications.
Articles.Author: Shaun Lawrence

Articles.Title: Controlling your Sonos speaker with .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: This post shows you how you can control your local Sonos speakers using a .NET MAUI application.… Why? Because you can.
Articles.Author: Andreas Nesheim

Articles.Title: Capturing screenshots in .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: Learn how to implement taking screenshots in your MAUI App.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: .NET Conf 2022 Focus on MAUI Recap
Articles.Description: If you are still catching up with the .NET Conf focus on MAUI recordings, maybe this blog post will help you out as it gives you a rundown of some of Hussain's favorite sessions
Articles.Author: Hussain Abbasi

Articles.Title: Roundup of .NET MAUI. - Week of August 15, 2022
Articles.Description: David rounds up the MAUI libraries and videos for the week
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: Say hello to Maui.ColorPicker
Articles.Description: Maui.ColorPicker is the evolution of XFColorPickerControl - a SkiaSharp powered color picker for .NET MAUI.
Articles.Author: Joachim Leonfellner

Articles.Title: Creating Device-Specific Views in .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: In this tutorial, we will see how we can implement device specific views for mobile and desktop using #dotnetmaui.
Articles.Author: Naweed Akram

Articles.Title: Welcome to .NET MAUI (Multi-platform App UI) | #SamosaChai.NET
Articles.Description: Somosa Chai.Net presentation with Nish Anil and James Montemagno with a welcome to MAUI - Covers Hybrid Blazor as well

Articles.Title: Surfing App | .NET MAUI UI Challenge
Articles.Description: Surfing App UI Challenge made with .NET MAUI.
Articles.Author: Javier Suárez

Articles.Title: Beyond Monkey: Building Real-world .Net MAUI Apps
Articles.Description: Make sure to check out this video course by Naweed - This is Part 1 of the course "Building Real-World Mobile Applications using .NET MAUI", where you learn to create complex and practical apps using #dotnetmaui.
Articles.Author: Naweed Akram

Articles.Title: Pub/Sub++ for .NET Apps with MediatR (Request AND Response)
Articles.Description: This video covers a library called MediatR which supports request/response, commands, queries, notifications and events, synchronous and async with intelligent dispatching via C# generic variance.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Generate Barcodes in 2 Lines of Code with .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: Generating barcodes has never been easier than with the ZXing.Net.Maui library! With just 2 lines of code you can generate QR codes and barcodes in all kinds of formats. Watch the video to learn how.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis
